alert.note: Alert for Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 4:42PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Nassau, southwestern Camden and east central Charlton Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 442 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Folkston, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Folkston and Homeland. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Western Charlton
